name: Super Space Drifter
description:
So here you are, drifting endlessly and aimlessly through space. But wait! Space is filled with indestructible rocks and things that shoot at you. So will you be able to survive a drift through the endless perils of space? Probably not, but hopefully you will last longer than 10 seconds.

How to play: Drift with the arrow keys, and shoot with the Z key.

Art by: surt from opengameart.org
